Contact.description: Details of the contact associated with the purchase order.

Date.description: The date and time when the purchase order was created.

DeliveryDate.description: The expected delivery date of the items in the purchase order.

LineAmountTypes.description: The types of line amounts included in the purchase order.

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: The unique purchase order number for identification purposes.

Reference.description: Any reference information associated with the purchase order.

LineItems.description: The individual line items included in the purchase order.

BrandingThemeID.description: The unique identifier of the branding theme associated with the purchase order.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for the purchase order.

Status.description: The status of the purchase order (e.g., draft, sent, approved).

SentToContact.description: Indicates if the purchase order has been sent to the contact.

DeliveryAddress.description: The delivery address for the items in the purchase order.

AttentionTo.description: The name or title of the person the purchase order is addressed to.

Telephone.description: The telephone number associated with the purchase order contact.

DeliveryInstructions.description: Any special instructions for the delivery of the items in the purchase order.

ExpectedArrivalDate.description: The expected arrival date of the items in the purchase order.

PurchaseOrderID.description: The unique identifier of the purchase order.

CurrencyRate.description: The exchange rate between the base currency and the purchase order currency.

SubTotal.description: The subtotal amount of the purchase order.

TotalTax.description: The total tax amount included in the purchase order.

Total.description: The total amount of the purchase order including taxes and discounts.

TotalDiscount.description: The total discount amount applied to the purchase order.

HasAttachments.description: Indicates if there are any attachments associated with the purchase order.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The date and time when the purchase order was last updated.

DeliveryDateString.description: The expected delivery date in string format of the items in the purchase order.

Type.description: The type of the purchase order (e.g., standard, recurring).

DateString.description: The date in string format of when the purchase order was created.

HasErrors.description: Indicates if there are any errors present in the purchase order.

IsDiscounted.description: Indicates if the purchase order has any discounts applied.

ExpectedArrivalDateString.description: The expected arrival date in string format of the items in the purchase order.
